entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:32 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 12:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: WSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
